p: The primary databases are the most comprehensive, publicly available databases for researchers of case law in the field of Climate law. According to the methodology of the database provided by the Grantham Research Institute for Climate and the Environment: “The analysis covers all UN and UNFCCC parties, including the European Union, as well as a number of countries, regions and territories that are not UN or UNFCCC members (e.g. Taiwan, Palestine and Western Sahara)” [70].
